scripts.build-frontend: echo 'Building frontend...' && cd ../front && npm install && npm run build && echo 'Frontend build completed' && cd ../back && mkdir -p ./public && cp -r ../front/dist/* ./public/ && echo 'Files copied to back/public directory successfully'
scripts.start-backend: echo 'Starting backend server...' && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node src/index.js
scripts.build-frontend-local: echo Building frontend... && cd ..\front && npm install && npm run build && echo 'Frontend build completed' && cd ..\back && echo 'AAAAA' && if not exist public (mkdir public) && echo 'BBBBBB' && xcopy ..\front\dist\* public\ /s /e /y && echo 'CCCCC' && echo 'Files copied to back\public directory successfully'
scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force public && cd ../front && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item ../front/dist/* -Recurse -Destination ../back/public
scripts.deploy-full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
